Qed.```

- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

```coq
intros h st n t es r st' ps H.
split; [|split].
- apply handleAppendEntriesReply_log with (h:=h) (st:=st) (src:=n) (t:=t) (es:=es) (b:=r) (st':=st') (l:=ps); auto.

- apply handleAppendEntriesReply_type_term with (h:=h) (st:=st) (src:=n) (t:=t) (es:=es) (r:=r) (st':=st') (ms:=ps); auto.
Qed.
